description: Routes an input message using LLM-based categorization.

input_text.info: The primary text input for the operation.

routes.info: Define the categories for routing. Each row should have a route/category name and optionally a custom output value.

route_category.description: Name for the route/category (used for both output name and category matching)

output_value.description: Custom message for this category (overrides default output message if filled)

message.info: Optional override message that will replace both the Input and Output Value for all routes when filled.

enable_else_output.info: Include an Else output for cases that don't match any route.

custom_prompt.info: Additional instructions for LLM-based categorization. These will be added to the base prompt. Use {input_text} for the input text and {routes} for the available categories.

status.using_custom_prompt: Using custom prompt as additional instructions
status.using_default_prompt: Using default prompt for LLM categorization
status.no_match_found: No match found for '{response}'. Available categories: {categories}
status.match_already_found: Match already found in process_case (Category {index}), stopping default_response
